de.mrapp.android.dialog.adapter

Class RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ViewHolderWrapper<VH>>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.adapter.RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper<VH>
  • Type Parameters:
    VH - The type of the view holder of the encapsulated adapter

    public class RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ViewHolderWrapper<VH>>
    A wrapper that encapsulates a recycler view adapter in order to manage the selection states of the adapter's list items.
    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode
      Defines the interface, a choice mode, which manages the selection state of list items, must implement.
      static class  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.MultipleChoiceMode
      A choice mode, which allows multiple list items to be selected at once.
      static class  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.NoChoiceMode
      A choice mode, which allows no list items to be selected at all.
      static interface  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.OnItemClickListener
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified when a list item has been clicked, must implement.
      static class  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.SingleChoiceMode
      A choice mode, which allows only a single list item to be selected at once.
      static class  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ViewHolderWrapper<T extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
      A wrapper, which encapsulates a view holder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new wrapper that encapsulates a recycler view adapter in order to manage the selection states of the adapter's list items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper

        public RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper(@NonNull
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  @NonNull
                                  androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH> wrappedAdapter,
                                  @NonNull
                                  RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates a new wrapper that encapsulates a recycler view adapter in order to manage the selection states of the adapter's list items.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the wrapper, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        wrappedAdapter - The encapsulated recycler view adapter as an instance of the class RecyclerView.Adapter. The adapter may not be null
        choiceMode - The choice mode, which should be used by the adapter, as an instance of the type RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode. The choice mode may not be null

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be set, as an instance of the type RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.OnItemClickListener or null, if no listener should be notified

                                            ListDialog.OnItemSelectedListener listener)
        Sets the listener, which should be notified, when a list item has been selected.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be set, as an instance of the type ListDialog.OnItemSelectedListener or null, if no listener should be notified

      • getChoiceMode

        @NonNull
public final RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode getChoiceMode()
        Returns the choice mode, which is used by the adapter.
        Returns:
        The choice mode, which is used by the adapter, as an instance of the type RecyclerViewAdapterWrapper.ChoiceMode. The choice mode may not be null

      • getWrappedAdapter

        @NonNull
public final androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH> getWrappedAdapter()
        Returns the encapsulated adapter.
        Returns:
        The encapsulated adapter as an instance of the class RecyclerView.Adapter. The adapter may not be null

      • isItemChecked

        public final boolean isItemChecked(int position)
        Returns, whether the list item at a specific position is currently selected, or not.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the list item, whose selection state should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        True, if the list item is selected, false otherwise

      • setItemChecked

        public final void setItemChecked(int position,
                                 boolean checked)
        Sets, whether the list item at a specific position should be selected, or not.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the list item, whose selection state should be changed, as an Integer value
        checked - True, if the list item should be selected, false otherwise
